text: The Incredible Hulk is a fictional character of Marvel Comics. The Incredible Hulk may also refer to: ==Comics== * The Incredible Hulk (comic book) * The Incredible Hulk (comic strip), a comic strip based in the TV series * Hulk Comic or The Incredible Hulk Weekly ==Film== * The Incredible Hulk (film), a 2008 film starring Edward Norton ** The Incredible Hulk (soundtrack) ==Television== * The Incredible Hulk (1978 TV series), a live-action TV series ** The Incredible Hulk: Original Soundtrack Recording (1999) * The Incredible Hulk (1982 TV series), an animated TV series * The Incredible Hulk (1996 TV series), an animated TV series * "The Incredible Hulk", a segment from The Marvel Super Heroes ==Video games == * The Incredible Hulk (1994 video game) * The Incredible Hulk: The Pantheon Saga, a 1996 video game * The Incredible Hulk: Ultimate Destruction, a 2005 video game * The Incredible Hulk (2008 video game) ==Other uses== * The Incredible Hulk (roller coaster), a roller coaster at Islands of Adventure in Orlando, Florida * Incredible Hulk (cocktail), a green cocktail ==See also== * Hulk (disambiguation) * Hulk in other media
title: The Incredible Hulk (disambiguation)
